gems.name: rtfm-filemanager
gems.info: A full featured terminal browser with syntax highlighted files, images shown in the terminal, videos thumbnailed, etc. You can bookmark and jump around easily, delete, rename, copy, symlink and move files. RTFM has a a wide range of other features. New in 3.8: Rewrite of core file listing engine for speedup. RTFM now handles simpler LS_COLORS. You can now supply a path as argument at startup to let RTFM start from that directory.
